verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are the journeys <S%H4550><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> they came <S%H3318><s%> out from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by their armies, <S%H6635><s%> under the leadership <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> recorded <S%H3789><s%> their starting <S%H4161><s%> places <S%H4161><s%> according to their journeys <S%H4550><s%> by the command <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> are their journeys <S%H4550><s%> according to their starting <S%H4161><s%> places. <S%H4161><s%>

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses <S%H7486><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month; <S%H2320><s%> on the next <S%H4283><s%> day <S%H4283><s%> after <S%H4480><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> started <S%H3318><s%> out boldly <S%H7311><s%> <S%H3027><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%>

while the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> were burying <S%H6912><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their first-born whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had struck <S%H5221><s%> down <S%H5221><s%> among them. The Lord <S%H3068><s%> had also executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on their gods. <S%H430><s%>
Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses, <S%H7486><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> in Succoth. <S%H5523><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> in Etham, <S%H864><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Etham, <S%H864><s%> and turned <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to Pi-hahiroth, which <S%H834><s%> faces <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Baal-zephon; and they camped <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Migdol. <S%H4024><s%>

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Hahiroth, <S%H6367><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> into the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> and they went <S%H1980><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days' journey <S%H1870><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Etham, <S%H864><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Marah. <S%H4785><s%>

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Marah, <S%H4785><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Elim; <S%H362><s%> and in Elim <S%H362><s%> there were twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> springs <S%H9407><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> and seventy <S%H7657><s%> palm <S%H8558><s%> trees; <S%H8558><s%> and they camped <S%H2583><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Elim, <S%H362><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin. <S%H9358><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin, <S%H9358><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Dophkah. <S%H1850><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Dophkah, <S%H1850><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Alush. <S%H442><s%>

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Alush, <S%H442><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Rephidim; <S%H7508><s%> now it was there <S%H8033><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rephidim, <S%H7508><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Kibroth-hattaavah.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Kibroth-hattaavah, and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Hazeroth. <S%H2698><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Hazeroth, <S%H2698><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Rithmah. <S%H7575><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rithmah, <S%H7575><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Rimmon-perez.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rimmon-perez, and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Libnah. <S%H3841><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Rissah. <S%H7446><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rissah, <S%H7446><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> in Kehelathah. <S%H6954><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Kehelathah, <S%H6954><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Mount <S%H2022><s%> Shepher. <S%H8234><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Shepher, <S%H8234><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Haradah. <S%H2732><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Haradah, <S%H2732><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Makheloth. <S%H4722><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Makheloth, <S%H4722><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Tahath. <S%H8480><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Tahath, <S%H8480><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Terah. <S%H8646><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Terah, <S%H8646><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Mithkah. <S%H4989><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Mithkah, <S%H4989><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Hashmonah. <S%H2832><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Hashmonah, <S%H2832><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Moseroth. <S%H4149><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Moseroth, <S%H4149><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Bene-jaakan.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Bene-jaakan, and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Hor-haggidgad.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Hor-haggidgad, and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Jotbathah. <S%H3193><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Jotbathah, <S%H3193><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Abronah. <S%H5684><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Abronah, <S%H5684><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Ezion-geber.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Ezion-geber, and camped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin, <S%H6790><s%> that is, Kadesh. <S%H6946><s%>

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Kadesh, <S%H6946><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor, <S%H2023><s%> at the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom. <S%H9000><s%>

Then Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> at the command <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and died <S%H4191><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> in the fortieth <S%H705><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had come <S%H3318><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> [day] in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>
And Aaron <S%H175><s%> was one hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty-three years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he died <S%H4194><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor. <S%H2023><s%>

Now the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Arad <S%H6166><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in the Negev <S%H5045><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of the coming <S%H935><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Then they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor, <S%H2023><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Zalmonah. <S%H6758><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Zalmonah, <S%H6758><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Punon. <S%H6325><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Punon, <S%H6325><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Oboth. <S%H88><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Oboth, <S%H88><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Iye-abarim, at the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Iyim, <S%H5864><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Dibon-gad.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Dibon-gad, and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Almon-diblathaim.
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Almon-diblathaim, and camped <S%H2583><s%> in the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim, <S%H5682><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Nebo. <S%H5015><s%>

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim, <S%H5682><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> [opposite] Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>
And they camped <S%H2583><s%> by the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> from Beth-jeshimoth as far <S%H5704><s%> as Abel-shittim in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> [opposite] Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'When <S%H3588><s%> you cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%>

then you shall drive <S%H3423><s%> out all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, and destroy all <S%H6><s%> their figured <S%H3605><s%> stones, <S%H4906><s%> and destroy all <S%H4906><s%> their molten <S%H6><s%> images <S%H3605><s%> and demolish <S%H4541><s%> all <S%H4541><s%> their high <S%H8045><s%> places; <S%H3605><s%>

and you shall take <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> and live <S%H3427><s%> in it, for I have given <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to you to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

'And you shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> according to your families; <S%H4940><s%> to the larger <S%H7227><s%> you shall give <S%H7235><s%> more <S%H7235><s%> inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and to the smaller <S%H4592><s%> you shall give <S%H4591><s%> less <S%H4591><s%> inheritance. <S%H5159><s%> Wherever <S%H413><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the lot <S%H1486><s%> falls <S%H3318><s%> to anyone, that shall be his. You shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> according to the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of your fathers.

'But if <S%H518><s%> you do not drive <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, then it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about that those whom <S%H834><s%> you let <S%H3498><s%> remain <S%H3498><s%> of them [will become] as pricks <S%H7899><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%> and as thorns <S%H6796><s%> in your sides, <S%H6654><s%> and they shall trouble <S%H6887><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you live. <S%H3427><s%>
'And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about that as I plan <S%H1819><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> to them, so I will do <S%H6213><s%> to you.' "
